overview: Aerobics has finally grown up...to the sensually delightful EROTICISE.  What is EROTICISE?  Simply the most uninhibited exercise session you've ever witnessed, a new film fantasy featuring a bevy of beauties who sweetly stretch and bend their way right out of their leotards - and into your heart.  Join them as they sway to the beat - or pull up an easy chair.  Either way, you're in for the workout of your dreams!
tagline: First there was "Aerobicize," then "Jane Fonda's Workout," Now, work up a REAL sweat...EROTICIZE
title: Eroticise
